definition: to love Hong Kong (usually implying that one also supports the PRC government)
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
Hong Kong, abbr. for 香港[Xiang1 gang3]/surname Gang
harbor/port/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The great majority of Hong Kong citizens love their country and Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 絕大部分香港市民都是愛國愛港的。
